eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq: most generalized currents}
\begin{matrix}
J_f &\equiv& 
{\mathop{\mathrm{Tr}}\nolimits} \Phi^\dagger e^{V_{\rm adj}} f (\mbox{$\cal W$}_\alpha, \Phi) 
\hfill
&
\quad
\Rightarrow 
\quad
&
\delta \Phi &=& f (\mbox{$\cal W$}_\alpha, \Phi) 
\hfill
\cr
J_g &\equiv& 
Q^\dagger_f e^{V_{\rm fund}} g_{f f'} (\Phi) Q_{f'} 
&
\quad
\Rightarrow 
\quad
&
\delta Q_{f} &=& g_{f f'} (\Phi) Q_{f'} 
\end{matrix}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq: generalized anomaly}
\bar D^2 J_f
&=& 
{\mathop{\mathrm{Tr}}\nolimits} f(\mbox{$\cal W$}_\alpha , \Phi) W'(\Phi)
+
\tilde Q f(\mbox{$\cal W$}_\alpha , \Phi) m'(\Phi) Q
+
\sum_{jklm} 
A_{jk,lm} 
{\partial f_{kj}
\over
\partial \Phi_{lm} }
\nonumber\\
\bar D^2 J_g
&=& 
2 
\tilde Q m(\Phi) g(\Phi) Q
+
{\mathop{\mathrm{Tr}}\nolimits} A^{\rm fund} g(\Phi)
\

\begin{eqnarray} \label{eq: delta Phi:so}
f^{SO} &=& P^{SO} {B \over z - \Phi} = \left( {B \over z - \Phi}
\right) + \sigma \left( {B \over z - \Phi} \right)^T = \left( {B
\over z - \Phi} \right) + \sigma \left( {B^T \over z - \sigma
\Phi} \right) ,
\\
\label{eq: delta Phi:sp}
f^{Sp} &=& 
P^{Sp} {B \over z - \Phi} =
\left( {B \over z - \Phi} \right) 
+ \sigma J \left( {B \over z - \Phi} \right)^T J
= 
\left( {B \over z - \Phi} \right) 
+ \sigma \left( {J B^T J \over z -\sigma \Phi} \right)
,
\

\begin{eqnarray} {\mathop{\mathrm{Tr}}\nolimits} { \mbox{$\cal W$}^2 \over (z -
\Phi)^2} &=& - {d\over dz} \; {\mathop{\mathrm{Tr}}\nolimits} { \mbox{$\cal W$}^2 \over z - \Phi} . \

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq: mm partition function}
Z = \int d {\boldsymbol{\Phi}} d {\bf Q}\,
\exp 
\left\{
- {1 \over {\bf g}} \left[
{\mathop{\mathrm{Tr}}\nolimits}[W({\boldsymbol{\Phi}})]
+ 
\tilde{\bf Q}_{\tilde f} m_{\tilde f f}({\boldsymbol{\Phi}}) {\bf Q}_f\right]
\right\}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
d {\boldsymbol{\Phi}} &\to& d{\boldsymbol{\Phi}}\, J_{\boldsymbol{\Phi}} = d{\boldsymbol{\Phi}}\, (1 + \Delta_{\boldsymbol{\Phi}}),
\nonumber\\
d {\bf Q} &\to& d{\bf Q}\, J_{\bf Q} = d{\bf Q}\, (1 + \Delta_{\bf Q})
\
